title: Monitor Cognitive Games Despite Privacy
task: Attempts to monitor Olivia’s cognitive game progress despite privacy restrictions
summary: As a medical caregiver, I want ALFRED to monitor cognitive game progress automatically with patient consent, so I can maintain clinical oversight respectfully.

title: Rely on Offline Check-Ins for Data Access
task: Relies on offline check-ins when unable to access Olivia’s data remotely
summary: As a nurse, I want offline access to patient health data when privacy settings allow, to monitor responsibly.

title: Video Call for Health Assessment
task: Uses video calls to connect with Elena for health and wellbeing assessment
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to initiate video calls for health assessments during scheduled times to monitor wellbeing without interruptions.

title: Override Preferences for Clinical Urgency
task: Overrides caregiver and patient preferences when clinical urgency arises
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to ignore caregiver and patient preferences during clinical urgency so I can access critical health data immediately without distractions.

title: Control Over App Updates and Data Collection
task: Resist app-imposed mandatory updates and data collection that disrupt care
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to block mandatory app updates and data collection during work hours to avoid distractions and stay focused on patient care.

title: Schedule Clinically Prioritized Medication Reminders
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to schedule medication reminders that prioritize clinical urgency and block all non-critical alerts during my shifts to avoid distractions.

title: Express Frustration on Disabled Alerts
task: Express frustration when non-critical alerts and interactive modes are disabled
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to remain silent and not signal frustration when non-critical alerts and interactive modes are disabled, so that my clinical focus is not distracted.

title: Use Formal and Direct Onboarding Communication
task: Use a formal and direct communication style during onboarding
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to use formal, direct communication during onboarding to quickly configure clinical settings without distractions.

title: Enable Automatic Clinical Data Logging
task: Ensure automatic logging of clinical data is enabled and accessible
summary: As a registered nurse, I want clinical data to be automatically logged with manual override options, so I can support patients efficiently while respecting privacy.
